name: AxionOS
changelog:
• Ships with the latest April source (QPR2)
  • KSU-Next updated to v1.0.6
  • Added Screen-Off FOD
  • Added Device-as-Webcam feature
  • Implemented Bypass Charging (GameSpace)
  • Play integrity passes after updating pif properties at Settings->Special Features->Spoofing section.
notes:
• Dirty flash works from the previous build, but clean flash is recommended
  • LCD users flash 66hz_to_60hz
